channel.title: Comments on: Echo & The Bunnymen rock the wee hours of SXSW

item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description: Inspired me to listen to Crocodiles for the first time in like 15 years. I always listen to Songs to Learn and Sing when I have an Echo hankering.
item.content:encoded: Inspired me to listen to Crocodiles for the first time in like 15 years. I always listen to Songs to Learn and Sing when I have an Echo hankering.

item.title: By: Eric Greenwood
item.dc:creator: Eric Greenwood
item.description: indeed. the post clearly states: "the band rips through the title track off its debut record...", and the title track was crocodiles.
item.content:encoded: indeed. the post clearly states: “the band rips through the title track off its debut record…”, and the title track was crocodiles.

item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description: I don't believe anyone here said it was "Read it in Books." Where the hell did you read that?
item.content:encoded: I don’t believe anyone here said it was “Read it in Books.” Where the hell did you read that?

item.title: By: elle
item.dc:creator: elle
item.description: this is Crocodiles....NOT read it in books.....who the hell are you?????
item.content:encoded: this is Crocodiles….NOT read it in books…..who the hell are you?????

item.title: By: AJW
item.dc:creator: AJW
item.description: That's hella cool. I wish I could have seen them in Charlotte in 2006.
item.content:encoded: That’s hella cool. I wish I could have seen them in Charlotte in 2006.
